scripts.vite:build: pnpm -F shared build && pnpm -F vite build
scripts.server:build: pnpm -F shared build && pnpm -F server prod:build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd vite && npm run dev" "redis-server"
scripts.dev:wsl: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd vite && npm run dev" "cd shared && npm run dev"
scripts.build:all: pnpm -F shared build && pnpm -F server prod:build && pnpm -F vite build
scripts.dev:bun: concurrently "cd server && bun run dev:bun" "cd vite && bun run dev" "redis-server"
scripts.dev:wsl:bun: concurrently "cd server && bun run dev:bun" "cd vite && bun run dev" "cd shared && bun run dev:bun"
scripts.build:all:bun: bun run -F @autumn/shared build:bun && bun run -F @autumn/server prod:build:bun && bun run -F @autumn/vite build:bun
